body.name: Listerine Clinical Solutions Gum Health Antiseptic Mouthwash, Antigingivitis & Antiplaque Oral Rinse Helps Prevent Buildup & Immediately Kills Germs for Healthier Gums, ICY Mint, 1 L
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 47 mins
features: The antigingivitis mouthwash treatment immediately kills the germs that cause bleeding gums, reduces gingivitis in 1 week* & helps maintain healthy gums for 12 weeks with continual use* *vs. brushing alone

Proven to maintain oral pH & powered with zinc, this antiplaque oral rinse helps prevent hard to remove buildup on teeth, reduces plaque bacteria below the gumline* & helps to reduce dental plaque while also helping to prevent gingivitis
To use this antiseptic mint mouthwash, adults & children 12 years & older, rinse full strength for 30 seconds with 20 mL in the morning & at night as a part of your twice daily oral care routine

Tested by dentists & hygienists, this ADA-accepted mouth rinse is formulated with eucalyptol, menthol & thymol. Aids in the prevention of gingivitis & helps control plaque while leaving a refreshing mouth feel
body.description: Help prevent plaque buildup & reduce gingivitis in 1 week* with Listerine Clinical Solutions Gum Health Antigingivitis & Antiplaque Antiseptic Mouthwash! This refreshing icy mint-flavored oral rinse from Listerine, the #1 dentist-recommended mouthwash brand, immediately kills the germs that cause bleeding gums & inflammation. The ADA-accepted zinc infused mouthwash formula contains powerful & effective ingredients that help prevent hard to remove buildup on teeth, reduce plaque bacteria below the gumline* & works hard to prevent gingivitis. Tested by dentist & dental hygienists, this mouthwash helps maintain healthy gums for 12 weeks with continual use*. Adults & children 12 & older, use twice daily after brushing with toothpaste as part of your oral care routine. Vigorously swish 20 mL mouthwash at full strength (don't dilute) between teeth for 30 seconds & then spit out. Do not swallow the mouthwash. *versus brushing alone

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #10,131 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #91 in Mouthwashes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolute best mouthwash ever. It did improve my gums after about a month. Be forwarned though the flavor is like a mild mint not bubblegum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, long lasting flavor. Still has the Listerine "zing".
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by the good flavor and effectiveness of this mouthwash. I have always enjoyed that Listerine “zing” and was wondering if that would be missing from this version but no, I still got that same “zing” though it was slightly lesser than the original Listerine which is quite strong. I was also wondering what this pink liquid would taste like, thoughts of bubble gum went through my head, but the flavor is actually very good! The label says it is “Icy Mint” which was not very minty to me but rather a very pleasant refreshing flavor that lasts a very long time… longer than other mouthwashes I have used. I like this mouthwash and won’t hesitate to get it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Give your gums some TLC with this icy mint mouthwash! It's a triple threat, targeting plaque buildup, killing germs that cause bleeding and inflammation, and leaving your mouth feeling invigorated. Say goodbye to gum woes and hello to a confident smile!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve usually used generic brand options before, but decided to give this a try. I’m impressed with the effectiveness. After rinsing, my mouth feels significantly cleaner and my breath fresher. I tested it shortly after drinking a cup of coffee and noticed immediate effects in the smell of my breath. The effect was surprisingly long-lasting, too, for some time after rinsing. In particular, I liked that, once you’ve rinsed, the taste that remains is fresh, but not overly minty.Regular use has helped me to feel my mouth and breath are cleaner and fresher than with regular brushing alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tingly Mint Goodness
reviews.reviewText: This has the familiar "fresh and burning tingly" feeling that I have come to expect with stronger antiseptic mouthwashes. This kept my breath fresh for a long time, too. My mouth feels cleaner when using this. Per my dentist, I floss first (loosen up the gunk), then brush, and finally use the mouthwash. I'm not sure this mouthwash is worth the current price tag, but it appears to be doing it's job of keeping my mouth healthier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Minty Clean Moushwash
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash has a nice minty taste that feels clean. No chemical weirdness or alcohol burn to it, it's not a hassle to swish and swirl in the mouth. I've used it every day for over a week now, and my gums have noticeably improved. They're less red and tender and some spots where I would bleed from when flossing have since stopped. Recommend trying this mouthwash if you're having gum issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Same as COOL MINT
reviews.reviewText: Product ok, but it’s the same formula as Listerine COOL MINT which sells for half the price. Same ingredients just marketed differently .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very... zincy (Listerine Clinical Solutions Gum Health Antiseptic Mouthwash)
reviews.reviewText: Initially tastes much like any other mouthwash before fading to an initially fruity (almost bubblegum) flavor. Then the zinc kicks in. It tastes like a zinc lozengier and that taste sticks around for hours. That's got to be a good thing and suggests the zinc really persists.Contains alcohol but no flouride.Seems like a fine mouthwash with a zincy twist.
